04 - Restaurant booking
Create
Over limit booking
07 - Return created status when create a new restaurant with 8 people capacity
07.1 - Return bad request status when create a new restaurant booking with over limit capacity

item.description: Requisições para simular uma tentativa de reserva de restaurante acima da capacidade. A requisição 07 cadastra um restaurante com capacidade para 8 pessoas. A requisição 07.1 cadastra a reserva. Esta deve ser executada 3 vezes para simular a reserva com capacidade de pessoas superior ao limite.

item.name: 01 - Return created status when create a new restaurant booking
02 - Return bad request status when create a new restaurant booking with an invalid restaurant ID
03 - Return not found status when create a new restaurant booking with an inexistent restaurant ID
04 - Return not found status when create a new restaurant booking with an inexistent user ID
05 - Return bad request status when create a new restaurant booking with an invalid booking date
06 - Return bad request status when create a new restaurant booking with an invalid booking date time
Get restaurant booking
01 - Return ok status when find restaurant booking
02 - Return bad request status when find restaurant booking by invalid restaurant id
03 - Return not found status when find restaurant booking by not existent restaurant id
04 - Return ok status when find restaurant booking by restaurant id but nothing was found
Cancel restaurant booking
01 - Return accepted status when cancel restaurant booking
02 - Return bad request status when cancel restaurant booking with invalid restaurant id
03 - Return bad request status when cancel restaurant booking by non existent restaurant id
04 - Return bad request status when cancel restaurant booking with invalid booking id
05 - Return bad request status when cancel restaurant booking by non existent booking id
06 - Return bad request status when cancel restaurant booking already canceled
Close restaurant booking

04 - Return bad request status when close restaurant booking with invalid booking id

06 - Return bad request status when close restaurant booking already canceled
